title: A Big Attack on Iran by the US and Israel
summary: The United States and Israel have attacked Iran together. This happened because Iran might be making nuclear weapons, which are very dangerous. The attacks caused explosions in many cities in Iran, like Tehran, Isfahan, and Qom. People saw smoke and heard loud noises. The US president, Donald Trump, said the US is doing this to protect Americans and stop Iran from getting nuclear weapons. He told people in Iran to stay inside their homes to be safe. We don't know yet if anyone got hurt. Iran closed its airspace, which means planes can't fly there right now. This is a big event that started after weeks of talks and threats.

background_read: This article is about a military attack by the US and Israel on Iran. Iran is a country in the Middle East that has been in talks about its nuclear program, which could lead to making nuclear weapons. The attacks happened in several cities, causing explosions and smoke. The US president said it's to protect people and prevent Iran from getting dangerous weapons. It's important because it affects safety and peace in the world.
Article_Structure: WHO: The United States and Israel attacked Iran.
WHAT: There were explosions in cities like Tehran, and smoke was seen.
WHERE: The attacks happened in Iran, including cities like Tehran and Isfahan.
WHY: The US said it's to stop Iran from getting nuclear weapons and protect people.

perspectives.description: They attacked to defend against threats and prevent nuclear weapons.
